attributes.action: Lift the hunting wild animals with dogs ban in Scotland 2002
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to lift the ban on hunting wild animals with dogs that was brought into force in Scotland in 2002 and closely followed in England and Wales in 2004

We would like the ban to be looked at and amended or lifted

These animals cause problems with mainly livestock and crops but also cause a lot more issues on a daily basis

Lift the ban in Scotland now .
